title: What is an algorithm?
variants: A sequence of instructions to solve a problem
Solving a problem using program code
A program to run on a computer

title: What is bubble sort?
variants: An algorithm to find the maximum number
A sorting algorithm that gradually moves elements to the end of the list
An algorithm to find the minimum element in a list

title: What does the depth-first search algorithm do?
variants: Visits all neighbors of a node
Finds the shortest path in a graph
Dives deep into a tree or graph

title: Which algorithm has a time complexity of O(n^2)?
variants: Bubble sort
Dijkstra's algorithm
Breadth-first search

title: What is a greedy algorithm?
variants: An algorithm that makes locally optimal choices at each step
An algorithm that finds a global optimal solution
An algorithm that works only with numerical data

title: Which algorithm is used to find the shortest path in a graph?
variants: Dijkstra's algorithm
Knuth-Morris-Pratt algorithm
Floyd-Warshall algorithm

title: What is binary search?
variants: An algorithm for searching in a sorted array
An algorithm for sorting an array
An algorithm for finding the maximum element in a list

title: What is dynamic programming?
variants: A method of solving problems by breaking them down into subproblems
An algorithm for sorting
An algorithm for searching in graphs

title: Which algorithm has the worst-case time complexity of O(2^n)?
variants: Depth-first search
Backtracking algorithm
Recursive Fibonacci algorithm

title: What is topological sorting?
variants: An algorithm for sorting arrays
An algorithm for linearly ordering the vertices of a directed acyclic graph
An algorithm for finding the shortest path

title: What is merging two sorted lists?
variants: An algorithm for merging two arrays into one
An algorithm for searching in graphs
An algorithm for merging two sorted trees

title: Which algorithm is used to find the greatest common divisor?
variants: Euclidean algorithm
Fibonacci algorithm
Bernstein algorithm
